entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023
